channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- Solid Edge SE2022
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- Solid Edge SE2022

item.title: CVE-2023-24558|2024-08-02T11:03:18.772Z -- siemens -- solid%20edge%20se2022
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Solid Edge SE2022 (All versions < V222.0MP12), Solid Edge SE2023 (All versions < V223.0Update2). The affected applications contain an out of bounds read past the end of an allocated structure while parsing specially crafted PAR files. This could allow an attacker to execute code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2023-24552|2024-08-02T11:03:18.800Z -- siemens -- solid%20edge%20se2022
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Solid Edge SE2022 (All versions < V222.0MP12), Solid Edge SE2023 (All versions < V223.0Update2). The affected application contains an out of bounds read past the end of an allocated buffer while parsing a specially crafted PAR file. This could allow an attacker to to execute code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2023-24581|2024-08-02T11:03:18.775Z -- siemens -- solid%20edge%20se2022
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Solid Edge SE2022 (All versions < V222.0MP12), Solid Edge SE2022 (All versions), Solid Edge SE2023 (All versions < V223.0Update2). The affected application contains a use-after-free vulnerability that could be triggered while parsing specially crafted STP files. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current process. (ZDI-CAN-19425)

item.title: CVE-2023-24563|2024-08-02T11:03:18.669Z -- siemens -- solid%20edge%20se2022
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Solid Edge SE2022 (All versions < V222.0MP12), Solid Edge SE2023 (All versions < V223.0Update2). The affected application is vulnerable to uninitialized pointer access while parsing specially crafted PAR files. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current process.

item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Solid Edge SE2022 (All versions < V222.0MP12), Solid Edge SE2023 (All versions < V223.0Update2). The affected applications contain an out of bounds read past the end of an allocated structure while parsing specially crafted PAR files. This could allow an attacker to execute code in the context of the current process.

item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Solid Edge SE2022 (All versions < V222.0MP12), Solid Edge SE2023 (All versions < V223.0Update2). This could allow an attacker to execute code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2023-24564|2024-08-02T11:03:18.737Z -- siemens -- solid%20edge%20se2022
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Solid Edge SE2022 (All versions < V222.0MP12), Solid Edge SE2022 (All versions), Solid Edge SE2023 (All versions < V223.0Update2). The affected application contains a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing specially crafted DWG files. This could allow an attacker to execute code in the context of the current process. (ZDI-CAN-19069)

item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Solid Edge SE2022 (All versions < V222.0MP12), Solid Edge SE2023 (All versions < V223.0Update2). The affected application contains an out of bounds write past the end of an allocated buffer while parsing a specially crafted PAR file. This could allow an attacker to to execute code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2023-24566|2024-08-02T11:03:19.234Z -- siemens -- solid%20edge%20se2022
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Solid Edge SE2022 (All versions < V222.0MP12), Solid Edge SE2022 (All versions), Solid Edge SE2023 (All versions < V223.0Update2). The affected application is vulnerable to stack-based buffer while parsing specially crafted PAR files. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current process. (ZDI-CAN-19472)

item.title: CVE-2023-24561|2024-08-02T11:03:18.698Z -- siemens -- solid%20edge%20se2022

item.title: CVE-2023-24550|2024-08-02T11:03:18.837Z -- siemens -- solid%20edge%20se2022
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Solid Edge SE2022 (All versions < V222.0MP12), Solid Edge SE2023 (All versions < V223.0Update2). The affected application is vulnerable to heap-based buffer while parsing specially crafted PAR files. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2023-24551|2024-08-02T11:03:18.796Z -- siemens -- solid%20edge%20se2022
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Solid Edge SE2022 (All versions < V222.0MP12), Solid Edge SE2023 (All versions < V223.0Update2). The affected application is vulnerable to heap-based buffer underflow while parsing specially crafted PAR files. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2023-24565|2024-08-02T11:03:18.646Z -- siemens -- solid%20edge%20se2022
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Solid Edge SE2022 (All versions < V222.0MP12), Solid Edge SE2022 (All versions), Solid Edge SE2023 (All versions < V223.0Update2). The affected application contains an out of bounds read past the end of an allocated buffer while parsing a specially crafted STL file. This vulnerability could allow an attacker to disclose sensitive information. (ZDI-CAN-19428)
